entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
